content: Has anyone noticed their ability to make mass changes to tracker items has gone away?
Yes, I've seen people use that interface, but never had the ability myself. Always made me jealous.
I also can't seem to use the Assignment feature, it's never been available for me, which has been an issue, so I've resorted to just logging a comment that the issue is in progress.
You weren't even set up as a tracker manager. That bit is now fixed
Let me know if you see an ability to do mass updates now or just the ability to edit trackers (e.g. assign dispositions)
It usually shows up as a button next to New Tracker Item on the Browse page, right? If so, no, I still don't have that, though it looks like I can use the Assignment feature now, thanks!
gForge support has been notified. They're working on a fix
FYI, I have mass update, thank you!
Also, it seems quite a bit snappier after the "reboot" :)

sigh. ok

mmm..... works for me
